androidx.slice.core

Class SliceHints

  • java.lang.Object
    • androidx.slice.core.SliceHints

  • public class SliceHints
extends java.lang.Object
    Temporary class to contain hint constants for slices to be used.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  SliceHints.ImageMode 

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String HINT_KEYWORDS
      A hint to indicate that the contents of this subslice represent a list of keywords related to the parent slice.
      static java.lang.String HINT_LAST_UPDATED
      Hint indicating an item representing when the content was created or last updated.
      static java.lang.String HINT_PERMISSION_REQUEST 
      static java.lang.String HINT_TTL
      Hint indicating an item representing a time-to-live for the content.
      static int ICON_IMAGE
      Indicates that an image should be presented as an icon and it can be tinted.
      static long INFINITY
      Constant representing infinity.
      static int LARGE_IMAGE
      Indicates that an image presented in a larger size and it shouldn't be tinted.
      static java.lang.String SLICE_METADATA_KEY
      The meta-data key that allows an activity to easily be linked directly to a slice.
      static int SMALL_IMAGE
      Indicates that an image should be presented in a smaller size and it shouldn't be tinted.
      static java.lang.String SUBTYPE_MILLIS
      Subtype to tag an item as representing a time in milliseconds since midnight, January 1, 1970 UTC.
      static java.lang.String SUBTYPE_MIN
      Subtype indicating that this content is the minimum value for a range.
      static int UNKNOWN_IMAGE
      Indicates that an image mode is unknown.

      • SUBTYPE_MIN

        public static final java.lang.String SUBTYPE_MIN
        Subtype indicating that this content is the minimum value for a range.
        See Also:

      • SLICE_METADATA_KEY

        public static final java.lang.String SLICE_METADATA_KEY
        The meta-data key that allows an activity to easily be linked directly to a slice.

        An activity can be statically linked to a slice uri by including a meta-data item for this key that contains a valid slice uri for the same application declaring the activity.

        See Also:
